entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Clearwater
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:38 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Clearwater 07:00 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023
Temperature: -4.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -8.6°C
Wind: WNW 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. Temperature steady near minus 4.
